00037 const size_t BlockCompressionHeader::LENGTH;

00042 void BlockCompressionHeader::encode(uint8_t **buf_ptr) {
00043   uint8_t *base = *buf_ptr;
00044   memcpy(*buf_ptr, m_magic, 10);
00045   (*buf_ptr) += 10;
00046   *(*buf_ptr)++ = (uint8_t)length();
00047   *(*buf_ptr)++ = (uint8_t)m_compression_type;
00048   Serialization::encode_int(buf_ptr, m_data_checksum);
00049   Serialization::encode_int(buf_ptr, m_data_length);
00050   Serialization::encode_int(buf_ptr, m_data_zlength);
00051   if ((size_t)(*buf_ptr - base) + 2 == length())
00052     write_header_checksum(base, buf_ptr);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void BlockCompressionHeader::write_header_checksum(uint8_t *base, uint8_t **buf_ptr) {
00056   uint16_t checksum16 = (uint16_t)(fletcher32(base, *buf_ptr-base) >> 16);
00057   Serialization::encode_short(buf_ptr, checksum16);
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00063 int BlockCompressionHeader::decode(uint8_t **buf_ptr, size_t *remaining_ptr) {
00064   uint8_t *base = *buf_ptr;
00065   uint16_t header_length;
00066   uint8_t bval = 0;
00067 
00068   if (*remaining_ptr < length())
00069     return Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_TRUNCATED;
00070 
00071   // verify checksum
00072   {
00073     uint16_t header_checksum, header_checksum_computed;
00074     size_t remaining = 2;
00075     uint8_t *ptr = *buf_ptr + length() - 2;
00076     header_checksum_computed = (uint16_t)(fletcher32(*buf_ptr, length()-2) >> 16);
00077     Serialization::decode_short(&ptr, &remaining, &header_checksum);
00078     if (header_checksum_computed != header_checksum)
00079       return Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER;
00080   }
00081 
00082   memcpy(m_magic, *buf_ptr, 10);
00083   (*buf_ptr) += 10;
00084   *remaining_ptr -= 10;
00085 
00086   Serialization::decode_byte(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, &bval);
00087   header_length = bval;
00088   HT_EXPECT(header_length == length(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00089 
00090   Serialization::decode_byte(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, &bval);
00091   m_compression_type = bval;
00092   HT_EXPECT(m_compression_type < BlockCompressionCodec::COMPRESSION_TYPE_LIMIT, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);  
00093 
00094   Serialization::decode_int(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, &m_data_checksum);
00095   Serialization::decode_int(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, &m_data_length);
00096   Serialization::decode_int(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, &m_data_zlength);
00097 
00098   if ((size_t)(*buf_ptr - base) == length() - 2) {
00099     *buf_ptr += 2;
00100     *remaining_ptr -= 2;
00101   }
00102 
00103   return Error::OK;
00104 }
